seo.title: Getting to Vernazza 2025 | Transportation Guide Cinque Terre
seo.description: Complete guide to reaching Vernazza. Train schedules, parking options, hiking routes, and boat connections to the most beautiful Cinque Terre village.

body.title: Getting to Vernazza
body.subtitle: No cars in the village center. Arrive by train, boat, or hiking trail. All options lead to one of Italy's most beautiful destinations.

features.title: By Train
features.description: Regional trains every 15-30 minutes. Station is in the village center.

features.title: By Ferry
features.description: Seasonal boat service from La Spezia and other villages.

features.title: On Foot
features.description: Coastal trails from Monterosso (2 hrs) or Corniglia (90 min).

features.title: By Car
features.description: Very limited parking outside the village. Not recommended.

features.title: Nearest Airport
features.description: Pisa (2.5 hours) or Genoa (2 hours) by train.

features.title: Cinque Terre Card
features.description: Includes unlimited trains between villages and trails.
